Short breaks and holidays

You are welcome to book for any number of days, though a minimum of two days is recommended if you would like to produce something to your own design.

We specialise in teaching you to unleash your creativity. Although standard designs are available should you want them, why not be inspired by the location, the sound of a piece of music, or perhaps the scent of a fragrance and translate this into a work of art to take home and treasure.

We can incorporate visits to local places of interest; our Chilham studio is close to Canterbury, Faversham, Beech Court Gardens, Mount Ephraim, Belmont House, Brogdale (national fruit tree collection), the North Downs Way and is situated on the edge of the beautiful Kent Downs AONB. For breaks held elsewhere, we will offer visits to other suitably inspirational sites.

See our leaded stained glass, copper foiled stained glass and glass appliqué pages for courses planned, or call and arrange a bespoke break for no extra cost! All short breaks and holidays cost just £65 per person for each of the first three days, with discounts for extra days.
